TopicTitle: I'm kind of new to ksp, I've got some Questions about spaceplanes

Articles.Content:
Hey there,

I\'m kind of new to ksp, been around since 0.15 but havent really gotten into until 0.16 for some reason (maybe it\'s EVA\'s) xD

But I really like the idea of where it is going, and I\'m getting onto designing my own spaceplanes, as I can do reasonable rockets (One is on a lucky pure blind luck intercept with the moon with 394L of fuel left) But I\'ve always found the idea of Space Planes, so much more interesting I guess, I also tend to find them more aesthetically pleasing too.

So I\'ll attach my design, and see what you make of it xD (It\'s very temperamental to fly) But it\'s the first one that actually flies and doesn\'t blow up before it gets air xD

May I introduce, Radical Industries Prath Star!
